content.detailedDescription: I went out in my front yard to check for the big dipper, when something got my eye to the east right over the tree top across the street from my home. as i watched two bright orange colored lights like the color of fire suddenly blinked on. i watched for 3 or 4 seconds. then the light went off. i thought it looked like the afterburner of a jet, but there was no noise and it seems so close. i watch for awhile but there was nothing else.
content.summary: Sky watching on clear night looked over treetops and saw two round object blink on then off

content.detailedDescription:
My company of naval recruits was in "column platoon" rank formation outside the recruit mess at the naval training center in san diego, ca along with approximately one thousand other recruits in the regiment one january morning in 1972. we were waiting for the doors to open for breakfast. the way we lined up we faced san diego bay. we could not see the bay from where we stood, but it was somewhere in front of us, th view blocked by military buildings and other natural obstructions.

as a recruit petty officer 1st class (rpo1)i was maintaining the 2nd platoon of my company, which was standing at-ease in formation; chilly twenty-something not-quite-sailors hungry and waking up for another day of routine marching, barracks inspections and calisthenics. while at-ease, there is no talking but sailors in ranks are free to move one leg around as long as the other leg remains in formation.

as i surveyed my platoon i heard one of my fellow recruits (name withheld) mumbling something about the man in the moon. i admonished him about not talking in ranks, but he continued to mumble. i admonished him again and he spoke out loud, "there's no man in the moon."

thinking he was trying to be funny i walked up to face him and to warn him one last time about not talking while in ranks, but he was insistent about there being "no man in the moon!"

by this time other recruits were starting to focus their attention on the conversation going on between us when i decided to humor him by looking up at the moon as i thought of something clever and threatening to say to him. that is when i realized that he was, in fact, correct. there appeared to be a full moon, but there was no moonlike definition. instead, the moon's surface seemed to shimmer with a sort of glowing iridescence that seemed to radiate from it in a bluish-white, slow undulation that was rather beautiful to observe. the "full moon" was almost overhead; possibly at an 80 to 88 degrees angle up from the horizon.

upon seeing what he was seeing i remarked, "you're right. there is no man in the moon."

almost as if on cue what we thought was a full moon suddenly seemed to rotate in a way which now showed it to be some type of saucer shaped object. when it rotated on what could only be described as it's x-axis it took on the shape of a cigar, but it did not stop there. it continued to rotate along that x-axis a few times before it began moving in somnabulistic fashion in various patterns in the sky. it made a few rather abrupt forward movements to the north and even performed a sharp right angle turn in mid flight without slowing down. some of its maneuvers reminded me of lissajous patterns one might display on an oscilloscope, except what we saw was a physical object in the sky and not an electrically generated beam of electrons projected by a cathode ray tube.

this incredible aeronautic display went on for a few minutes. you can guess that it caused quite a stir through the ranks. by any example we all had fallen out of formation and standing at-ease gave way to chaos. suddenly, the object seemed to move many miles out to sea past san diego bay in the blink of an eye. i cannot say how far it movd, but it had to be at least 10 to 20 miles at least. it stopped and hovered momentarily and then seemed to dim out into nothing, but i believe this is just how it was perceived from our vantage point. i believe it moved away from us so rapidly that it looked like it dimmed and went out, but it actually flew away from us at an incredible speed.

within seconds after the object disappeared our company commanders and the regiment commanderers showed up and restored order. i forgot to mention that just prior to the ufo incident they mustered to a meeting which left me and the other recruit petty officers in charge of the platoons.

quickly reminding us that we were out of ranks and while threatening to impose maximum disciplinary tactics upon us if we did not compose ourselves, the officers ordered us to explain why we were out of ranks.

each company commander, upon hearing from their platoon leaders what caused the ruckus, proceeded to order us to not repeat what we saw to anyone at any time under penalty of courts martial, and they were very serious.

i still do not know if what we saw was extraterrestrial or if it was something human-made, but whatever it was it was the most incredible, beautiful and aerodynamically adept flying object i have ever seen. i hate to use this adjective, because it is overused, but what we witnessed was awesome.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Object was first thought to be the full moon, but notion was dismissed when object began moving.

content.detailedDescription: My daughters called me outside and i saw a large object very bright 100-200 feet above us. it hovered, flew like an octagon pattern , hovered then flew over us. the lights changed from white to red to blue. it appeared to change shapes a few times! we were afraid but in awe! when it flew over us i heard a whir noise and saw red v shaped lights under it! we saw a few more afterward but in the distance. i posted photos on fb and one of my friends and her family saw it as well. it was not a plane or helicopter and definitely not a meteor. my daughter saw the same thing about a week ago! the photos were emailed from my daughters phone and i can't post them. i will email them to you when you contact me!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My 2 daughters yelled for me to come outside and we witnessed the craft hover the  pass over our house changing cord and appearing to shape shift!

content.detailedDescription: Shiny disc shaped object hovered in a clear blue sky. i was staring at it because it was such an odd shape and definitely not a plane. no blinking lights. at a stop light i just blinked and the object instantly disappeared with no noise, no contrail, no place it could have moved behind.
content.summary: Silver disc hovering in clear blue sky then instantly disappears

content.detailedDescription: Approx 1 am april 19th - it started with the dog barking outside in the backyard which is fairly common. upon opening the door i was taken back by a pulsating noise which seemed to run through my body. as a walked outside i noticed lights rising from behind a fence located approximately 20 feet away. at which time i was stunned and fixed on what i was seeing. the lights were very erratic ranging from red,white, blue and green. the objects and lights were facing me as it began to rise, at which point i yelled for my girlfriend to come outside. we both stood in amazement as we couldn't explain anything about what we were witnessing.  the way it rose/flew was so effortless and steady, the noise it made was a slow but heavy pulse felt throughout our bodies. as it rose above the surrounding buildings the street lights allowed us to view the underside of the craft. it was somewhat triangular/ teardrop with a slightly rounded front where the lights were mounted coming to a sharp point at the rear. the craft was dark and metallic looking and appeared to be extremely heavy despite how effortlessly it moved. it made a very large circle around our house covering a vast area in a unexplainably short period of time passing right through the original viewing area before it took off at a steady angled incline. as it past through the original viewing area we manged to snap a cell phone picture which seemed to catch the lights on the object as well as some of its shape.
content.summary: Extremely bright lights, pulsating sound, metallic structured craft.

content.detailedDescription: Driving car northbound around 930 pm cst noticed fast moving globe of bright white light fly above and northbound then disappear. lasted only several seconds. i've never seen anything like it, neither had my passenger. felt i should report it since two weeks later i saw a news item regarding balls of light seen in this area.
content.summary: Driving after dark i noticed a ball of light fly overhead and beyond my car then vanish

content.detailedDescription:
I was a tarot card reader on aol for a few years and a colleague reader told me i had a glow about me now ill tell you about this glow.

one nite i was lying down in bed when suddenly this portal opened up in the wall behind me i was transported to an area that appeared to be in the dessert southwest i could see the cacti and sage brush that were common polace to that region i also noticed some other types of flora that looked like a type of yucca plant there was also a mib there along with a little girl that was about 3 or 4 yrs old all of  sudden 4 columns that looked like they were made of steel came out of the ground id say the height of these columns were about 15 ft or so next there was this rectangular ship that came out of the sky and made a piin point landing on the columns thats when the mib started taking measurements looked like he had a tape measure like contractors would use the little girl started fussing so i tried to get her calmed down some then all of a sudden these amber lights came on under the ship they stayed ion a few mins then they went off just likee they came on then there was this thin amber light beam that went across the bottom of the ship like we were being scanned then these steps came out of the bottom of the shipp and these 2 biped pig like creatures came out i wanted to get out my 357 and blow them away but the mib said no dont do that i was taken on the ship and placed on this table that looked like an examination table i couldnt move or speak thats when they stuck a needle in my head and took a liquid out then they put a liquid in ergo the ufo glow i was on that ship next i was back home and the portal closed up.
the giovt knows more about these things than they are willing to admit and i think it time they owbned up to it also it was later revealed to me as to who the mib was but even they have pricvacy rights so i wont be telling whom it was yes the needle hurt
content.summary: I was assimilated resistance was futile and it wasnt by the borg

content.detailedDescription: Let me begin by saying i am an avid amateur astronomer. i am college educated. i have been "watching the skies" for over 30 years, and have never seen anything i could call a ufo. i have a very solid understanding of the motion of the moon, planets and stars, or should i say, our view of the night sky as the earth rotates and our view into space changes. i have seen countless satellites, and understand that regardless of their altitude above the earth, when we can see them they are "high" enough that they are simply reflecting the sun's light, making them visible to our location on the planet. i know that when directly overhead they will appear to move in straight lines and that if they remain visible long enough, they can sometimes appear to slowly "bend" their flight path, and that this is simply what we see as they orbit the earth. a true satellite will never make any noise (how and why would it?) and will simply appear to be an un-blinking, moving "star". i can very easily tell the difference between an airplane, helicopter or satellite. from our location on the far western suburbs of st.Louis, we often see (and hear, as they rapidly decrease speed and lower altitude} airplanes as they line up to land at lambert int'l airport. flights headed out of lambert headed to points west are also easily recognizable as they have not yet reached cruising altitude. of course we also see many flights flying at much higher altitudes as they criss-cross the country. the random helicopter in the area is always accompanied by the tell-tale noise of that type of craft. every commercial plane and helicopter i have ever seen at night has either had blinking lights and/or emitted sound. i have very detailed knowledge of military aircraft and during the day, if flying at a low enough altitude, can easily tell the exact type of nearly anything flying overhead. all that being said, i am by no means any type of "expert" and understand that occasionally there's going to be something overhead that will make me scratch my head. so on to this morning's events and why i felt compelled to share my story; at just after 03:30 i stepped outside to get a glimpse of the lyrid meteor shower. this morning was the peak of this annual april meteor shower, and even though the waning moon and my general location did little to help my viewing, i never miss a meteor shower when my schedule allows it. the radiant of this meteor shower appears to originate from the constellation lyra(hence the name lyrid meteor shower) and is easily found by the bright star vega this time of year. vega and the rest of lyra rise in the northeast around 22:00 (10p.M.) so by the time i was outside at just after 03:30 the constellation is nearly directly overhead. i planned on watching for about an hour, and as i just mentioned the radiant of the shower is nearly directly overhead, so to be as comfortable as possible i grabbed a sleeping bag and a few pillows and laid on top of our pop-up camper, parked in our driveway. i had been watching the shower for around 20 minutes (sure of the time because i had just glanced at my cell phone to note how long i had been viewing the shower) this meteor shower was very uneventful. i had only witnessed 2 or 3 very faint meteors in the time i had been watching, but continued to watch in the small hopes i might see a burst in activity or perhaps a fireball meteor. very small chance at any of that happening, but over the years i've learned to be patient and occasionally, you're rewarded with a nice surprise. very shortly after checking the time, i witnessed what appeared to be a satellite moving from the northeast to the southwest. my eyes were adjusted to the dark by now and i very quickly picked up the object and immediately identified it. i thought "hmm, well at least there's something to watch" and began to track it. there were no clouds, and besides the light pollution from the moon and my surroundings on the edge of a major metropolitan area (both sources predominantly coming from the east) my view of the "satellite" and its course were clear. just after breaking 90 degrees (directly overhead) the object made a very abrupt turn to the east for 2 or 3 degrees, then continued on a now due-south course. my thinking now changed from "ho-hum, a satellite" to "what the hell did i just see?!" i was amazed. i have never seen what was clearly an object in space make such a maneuver! (side note-no sound at all- what you would expect from a satellite) the object now continued on its due-south track for a few more degrees across the sky as my mind raced wildly trying to come up with a rational explanation. little did i know things were about to get very, very strange. at this time i feel the need to preface the rest of what happened by telling you i have 20/20 vision and i was not under the influence of any drugs or alcohol. seriously. now the object comes to a complete stop and another, fainter object seems to emerge from it, very rapidly circling the first object. then both objects disappear and then re-emerge close to their original spot, yet clearly in a new position. remember there are no clouds, and these objects are still quite high in the sky, very far from the horizon. i know how clouds and/or trees can make an object appear to "dance" or "disappear" and "re-appear". please remember i've been watching the skies for astronomical reasons for a long time. it gets even stranger and i actually begin to get frightened. i continue to watch, even saw a bright meteor or two in my field of view, but never took my eyes off the "dancing satellites." now an odd, thin cloud-like mist appears around the objects and i start thinking seriously about heading inside. my mind still racing for a logical explanation. i found the best wording for the mist in describing the event on your site: aura. this weird, aura, cloud-like mist is surrounding these objects as they disappear, re-appear, revolve around one another and dance wildly in the sky, yet only moving a degree or so in the sky. no clouds anywhere in view. no logical explanation. flying. unidentied. objects. by the very definition-ufo's. as my heart races and i become seriously concerned, (seriously? i'm an educated, life-long sky watcher that can identify 90 percent of every star in the sky and i'm afraid? what the hell is going on???!!!) the brighter object appears to absorb the fainter object and both disappear and then bam! the aura-mist disappears and i wonder if my wife has poisoned dinner and it's just now taking effect. i try to watch to see if anything else super-strange happens or if the music from close encounters might start up, but decide to call it a night. i tried to grasp what i had just witnessed, my mind and heart having a race to see who is quicker, came inside, googling like a mad man to see if anyone else had seen the same thing (twitter? facebook? anyone???) and decided, for the first time, i had witnessed something truly unexplainable. period. i have no proof. nothing. just my story. please let me know if i saw swamp gas reflecting the light from not yet risen venus or a high-altitude weather balloon. thanks.
content.summary: Satellite changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday morning april 22nd 2014 i went into my backyard which faces north east to try and view the lynids meteor shower. i was only out for a few minutes and had not seen a meteor when some movement drew my eye a bit to my left. when i focused on the object i was stunned to see very dim, orange lights in a triangle pattern. it was totally silent and seemed to flow smoothly through the sky. at first it looked like it had a solid black triangle base (i think there were 7 lights but i'm not sure i was to busy freaking out!) but then it seemed that it wasn't solid and was almost transparent but there was definitely mass between the lights, they were not free floating orbs but as it started to disappear (somewhere between 5 to 10 seconds later) it was no longer a perfect triangle. it looked as if one of the lights had shifted a bit. this could have been due to it turning or something but i can't be sure because i lost sight of it.  it seemed to only be a few thousand ft high and moved very fast. after it disappeared i stood there with my heart thudding and wondering what the hell had i just seen!? then i rushed back into my house to get my phone.  i noticed the time was 1:24am. i called a friend of mine and got no answer so i then looked up the number to deer valley airport which is just south west of my home. i spoke to a man named josh but he was unable to give me any info but he got a kick out of my story.   
the object was not bright and easily noticeable. if i had not been staring intently at that sky i would have not caught it. i would describe it as "stealthy" silent and smooth. it was totally unreal looking. i'm hoping others got a glimpse of it while they were out star gazing and report it!
content.summary: Dull orange lights in the form of a triangle with darker almost transparent background totally silent

content.detailedDescription:
April 20, 2014. approximate time of ufo event 2:45-3:15pm.
prior to the ufo sighting i was relaxing on the beach, alone, with eyes closed and radio volume turned low. i heard a faint whirring or humming sound coming from above, which is what made me open my eyes. i looked up and saw a strange object hovering directly above me. there were other people on the beach too, not that far away from me, but no one else seemed to be looking up at it. from my vantage point, the general shape of the object was like a four-leaf clover or four-pointed star, with cone-shaped appendages. 
i then watched the object move back and forth along the shoreline, in a slow, scanning type motion. my first thought was that it was some sort of remote-controlled toy that somebody on the beach was playing with. but when i looked around, this was not the case. in fact, no one else on the beach seemed to be paying any attention at all. my second thought was that the object was some sort of drone, as it was too small in size to hold any occupants.
i grabbed my cell phone and began taking pictures just as the object started to move away. it moved in a westerly direction, away from the shoreline, toward the condo buildings. i was able to snap 5 or 6 photos as it hovered briefly near the buildings. it then immediately shot straight up into the sky at a high rate of speed, and i then lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the beach, saw ufo hovering above me, moved away, then shot straight up

content.detailedDescription:
I had just shown up home from running down to the convenient store to grab some things.When i entered my backyard to get inside an orange orb came up from behind the trees.

(ascended from 10ft off the ground to 30 ft in air. around 50 ft away flying out from behind the trees like it was waiting.)

its gaining altitude. moving in an aerial manner, almost arch-like, at me. the first several seconds i look at it, its amazing, immediately knowing this was unlike anything i had ever seen before. then i realize its gaining speed and descending straight towards my direction. i became extremely panicked and bolted inside at a "run for your life" speed.

upon entering my home my family was playing around with each other,obviously oblivious to was i had just experienced. but i felt so shaken up i just tried to say nothing and alarm no one. because i felt as though if anyone looked out with curiosity something very bad was going to happen. after about 10 minutes inside i'm telling myself "its gone" why would it stick around. i felt like the orb had left and enough time went by that an object moving at that speed would be at least several miles away by now. 

(roughly 15 minutes later)

me and my girlfriend at the time, went downstairs to my room. i couldn't handle not telling her so i did. she without a second thought ran over to the window. im talking her away from it. "babe please! come on its gone, exc." but she was already looking out the window.
i stood on the far side of the room saying "katie? katie, whats up?" i walk over and peered out behind her shoulder and there it was the orb. hovering on the other side of the lake, 400 ft or less. almost the instant it saw me it shot towards me at a speed i have never seen.

i have no memories after that besides a mental snapshot of jumping or something into my bathroom with both feet in the air as though i was literally jumping away from the orb.
then me and her wake up the next day as though nothing had ever happened.

over the next month or so i would steadily regain memory of that event, although that block of missing time remains just that, and i have no memory of anything after it shooting towards me.

(it was at a completely different direction than where it was originally. i originally saw it east, moving west, towards my position. now it was 500 or so ft. south, moving north, towards my position.)
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: An orange orb that reacted to me very aggressively.

content.detailedDescription: The night was april 14th 2014 and it was the first blood moon of the blood moon tetrads. i was aware the eclipse would be at 10:53 pm so went outside with my telescope and ipad and iphone. went out to my balcony where normally i look out west for a good ocean view. that day the moon was over my house south and up in the sky about 60 degrees above the horizon. made about 15 videos within first hour of watching. realizing the actual eclipse was not at the time i thought it would be i ended up watching and making much more videos than i thought i would.  the video with the footage i captured was 2 minutes and 22 seconds long and had the brightest glows coming from left and right side of blood moon. i also filmed simultaneously an iphone video next to ipad with not capturing the ufo. the evidence is best captured by the ipad. i found that immediately before eclipse by slowing down the video and listening, there is a specific noise that resembles vibrations in an energy fluctuation that happen as the moon disappears on video. the moon at that time was near the middle of the screen while there was a simultaneous difficulty keeping perfectly focused on the moon and not moving. i noticed the noise when i slowed down the video. as the moon disappeared i had my eyes fixed on the sky, it was very clear for san diego that night i had not seen any object move through the sky in over an hour of being out there. as the moon reappeared i saw at the exact time a burst of light streak out from the moon being larger than the moon the instant i saw it and 3 times the length. it seemed to roll and bend then disappear in a total time of a second to a second and half. before i responded audibly, i thought it was a comet or fireball. quickly changing my mind because my better than 20/15 vision told me the object changed shape seeming to back up in the sky and then roll before disappearing in the distance of 2 inches in the sky. my reaction on the video is "what the f*** was that?" followed by heavy breathing and few other noises before finally turning off video about a minute after seeing object. object was white with faint grey white like particles as extreme shape stretched and had grey mist like when disintegrating from largest and longest on video reanimated starship form as it jumps into a wall of white light that appears as cut in sky, pulls in starship like object and never illuminates past the wall of light cut in sky. only thing that passes wall of light is particles that seemed to trail the object from the instant it was viewable showing a clear linear path from the moon as it appears. the first time it appeared it is the starship form then it stretches and distorts like it does at the end, almost opening what seems to be the portal but suddenly retracts back into starship form before becoming much smaller going backwards towards the moon again and stopping the size and shape of the moon in view . then it morphs into original starship form again more solid looking than ever it stays in the sky not moving. image is clearest at this point with a very distinct shape that was repeated earlier. when it starts to move forward for last time it is after a short delay a light wall resembling a cut in the sky illuminates. as the starship moves forward towards the wall of light it dematerializes into the wall of light, where no ambient light passes. the entire time the solid ambient illuminated starship and morphing pattern was bright and an obvious light source in the sky. only trailing particles pass the wall of light.  these are the same particles that faintly are seen as a line behind object in sky and passing through wall of light as it disappears. the close up of a frame of this final particle trail and leftover empty space gap where the wall of light was is incredible, this was where the particles faded into nothing and everything in view was gone. looks as if the light was cut right out of the sky. after the event i was shaken but cool (after the heavy breathing and gulps) because it was not first weird thing i have seen. i was excited to check ipad for footage of what was in the sky after finding the evidence was captured on video i have not been able to stop thinking of incident and analyzing it in many ways. it���s on my mind a lot.  i continued to make videos for an hour after the ufo event. none of the preceding or post event videos showed anything of significance and only included parts of the phases of the blood moon.  i was outside from 10:45 pm - 1:00 am 4/15/2014. i believe to the best of my knowledge the actual time was 11:58 pm pacific time on 4/14/2014 when the phenomenon occurred 1 minute 13 seconds into the 2 minute and 22 second recorded ipad video. when eclipse of blood moon was first seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Ufo appears from blood moon morphs and scales back to original shape before light wall opens and dematerializes ufo in the closing light wall.

content.detailedDescription:
My 2 daughters, a friend, and i were standing outside (beautiful, clear night) at about 11pm on 4/20/14  when i saw a bright purple light in sky slowly heading from east-west. it stopped almost directly above us and i pointed it out (i said that i'd never seen an airplane or satellite with purple lights) so we all were watching when it stopped in place for about 10 seconds, then immediately went back in opposite direction at much higher rate of speed. we thought it was a plane crashing, but it stopped near the horizon and shot straight up in the air for an (estimated) 500 feet, stopped, and dropped back down again. it did this 4 times, then it went back toward horizon and disappeared. 
it was definitely the strangest thing i've ever seen, especially the abruptness and maneuverability at such a high speed. it covered a lot of ground very quickly and changed direction without any visible arc or turn like an airplane would have to make.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very fast purple light, stopped abruptly, turn directly around, down to horizon and ascended/descended mult times in quick succession

content.detailedDescription: I was on my phone in my bedroom late monday night. with my peripheral vision, to my left, i saw a set of three led looking lights. it was hovering in the air for almost a minute. halfway through the colour changed from blue to red. then from red it turned to burgandy. finally it went from burgundy to the same colour as the sky.
content.summary: Ufo in ontario

content.detailedDescription: My 11 year old daughters were playing on our trampoline when one of them ran inside and said dad there is something in the sky and its not a plane. i ran out side and looked up. there was a brilliant white cigar shaped object moving across the sky from north to south. moment later my wife came out and saw it also.  we watched it for about a minute before it was out of site. a commercial airplane flew underneath it as we were viewing it. it was higher then the plane and a bit bigger even though it was farther away. wow is all i can say.
content.summary: Watched with my wife and kids a large cigar shape white craft move across the sky from north to south. brilliant white color.

content.detailedDescription: My 15 year old son and i had just left my brothers house to drive home. we live in the same neighborhood so was only about a mile drive. as soon as i pulled out of his street onto the main interior street of our neighborhood which is butterfield parkway i caught a quick glimpse of a green and red light. as i continued down the street which is about a three mile circle around the inside of our neighborhood it first goes in a north direction then to an east direction i came to the main entrance to our subdivision where my son and i both saw the lights again as there was no obstructions to our view. it was a very bright green steady light on the left side of the object and two distinct bright red lights on the right side. the two red lights would glow brightly about every second almost like flashing. it was traveling from west to east and appeared to be about an 1/8 of a mile or closer to us. it was moving east at about 20 mph. there as no sound. my son thought it could possibly be a helicopter. we pulled over to observe it for about a minute until some trees and houses blocked our view. continued on to my section where i live and we pulled over and watched it again through the clearings as it continued on east until again blocked from our view. we then went home. the thing that puzzled me was the navigation lights were on the wrong side of this object for the direction it was traveling. it was going away from us heading east as we were faced east and the green light should have been on the right side not the left. the lights looked like they were almost attached to each other they were so close. the green light was very bright and steady. the two red lights were also very bright, close together, and flashed together about every second.To be honest i have no idea what it was but as low as it was if it was an aircraft they were flying extremely low about 300 feet above the houses and made no noise. i know at least one other person saw it as they pulled their car past me and was waiting at the traffic light to my subdivision to exit and when the light turned green for them to go they just sat there most likely watching what we were watching until the traffic light turned red again.
content.summary: Green/two red super bright lights just above homes in arizona

content.detailedDescription:
I filmed, what i would describe as a transparent glider going 5-7 mph fly almost directly over my head. the only reason i explain it as that, is because i saw the nav lights blinking (5-6 bursts at a time) on the wing tips, but never saw a fuselage. i could see stars between the wing lights until it flew over head, then briefly it blocked out a star. originally, i didn't think it was a "ufo", but a government aircraft. i dunno?
i thought i was over thinking a sighting until my sons friend told me he saw the same object when he and his mother we driving home from his fathers house, not 2 miles away.

if you could imagine 2 blinking "horizontal" lights, around 140ft apart, flying about 120ft over head, at around 5-7 mph....And then once they passed you... they banked left at a 40deg angle to the left and continued on. (i'm comparing the flight path to the tree line behind my house and the adjacent street, and the tree height of my neighbors house @ 60-70 ft, if you calculate 80ft width per lot, it's a pretty good estimate). note i filmed from my patio, then walked to the back left of my yard to capture all i could. you can  hear my a/c unit and i95 in the background. as it passes directly overhead, i didn't hear any additional noise? that's when i stopped filming and my sons friend saw it 30 seconds later. he stated that when he saw it the 2 lights were almost verticle. one on top of the other...

being religious people, they weren't about to look into it, beyond being spooked.

being that i captured it with an iphone and it was night...I would love for you to wash it out and tell me what you can see. i don't have the proper software to do the job. sorry for the 3 clips, but my phone can send it in 1 shot.

attached is another video. just a blue light in the night sky...I caught  the second appearance of this blue light in a matter of minutes, although i don't hear the whining of an rc engine... i believe this to be an rc helicopter, or something of the sort. the first sighting- it went vertical- moved to the right- then to the left- then vertical- then horizontal. i could understand the immediate reaction of "it's a flare" but the actions of the light just before i picked upy phone would beg to differ...I captured this one on the second go around. you tell me!

i would just like a clear edit of my videos. thanks
content.summary: It flew from the south (my view from the patio) directly past me, over my neighbors house off to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside playing with my football and looked up into the sky. when i looked up i saw this giant triangle-shaped object with a tail behind it. i thought it was a cloud but about 15 minutes after i saw it, it changed direction. i was very curious. it disappeared after about 20 minutes of me seeing it. i never saw it again after that.
content.summary: It was a large triangle with a tail

content.detailedDescription: I have walked my dog in the same place for 2 years plus. there is a 20 acre field next to where i walk him , i felt a wooping noise  ( woop woop woop ) you could feel it in your body. we have trucks on the interstate and i know that sound and it was not that !The dog paid no attention to the sound at first, but after we were back on our property he looked toward the north and i looked and saw sparks from the field, the dog barked over and over again , and then stopped.  seeing the sparks between the two houses and the field was strange . it was the weirdest feeling i have had , and i am an avid hunter, and i am always in the woods and have never heard or saw anything like this ever! the sound went right through you. i did not see a craft or any kind of lift off ,just sparks, but i know there was something there! i brought the dog home and told my mother , and then went back to the area with a 2 million candle power light and saw nothing. if my neighbors saw me the must think i am crazy. i am a 49 year old male and it scared me !!!!!
content.summary: Walking the dog felt the wooping noise for 1-2 min, then saw sparks from 400 feet away.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident took place on the evening of september 2nd, 1976 in gates mills, oh near dorchester road. at the time i was 15 years old. i was out with two neighbor friends visiting a third friend who lived on dorchester. it was about 9:30 pm and we had just backed out of our friends driveway. as we preceded west toward som center rd. we noticed a large, lighted object about a hundred yards above the ground and about 60 yards off to the right of the road traveling slowly in a southwesterly direction. the object appeared to be approximately 75 feet in diameter and at first appeared as a group of parallel rows of stationary lights with a large row of lights in the middle row. there were several other rows of lights above and below the center row with each row getting progressively smaller towards the top and bottom of the object. i would describe the shape of the object to be rectangular with rounded corners at this point in the sighting.  

as we continued toward the object it also continued to move on its path which would intersect ours at our current rate of speed at just before som center. after about 15 seconds the lights on the object began to rotate around the object in a counterclockwise direction. my immediate impression was that we were witnessing some kind of intentional display. the lights were not blinding or especially bright. as we watched and continued down the road the lights abruptly shut off with the exception of one light in the top left corner of the object. the light changed colors from white to red, to orange and back again. shortly after the main lights shut off the object crossed our path. it was at this time that i studied the outline of the objects shape which i could faintly see from ambient light, perhaps moonlight or lights from nearby homes. i distinctively noticed a boomerang or check mark shape of the unlit object at this time. the remaining light was at the tip of the short end of the check mark.

as we were watching the object float across our view, the remaining light appeared to rapidly zip away to the left at a high rate of speed. we watched the light move perhaps several miles in the same southwesterly directly within seconds. after a few minutes we lost sight of the light and it disappeared. 

following this incident we called the gates mills police department to report it but they did not appear to be interested. we also called the plain dealer and reported the incident. they published a brief mention in on page 2 in the people section.
content.summary: Object viewed at night moving slowly with rows of stationary lights above the road as we were driving on. lights began to rotate around the object until it intersected or path than shut off  revealing the shape of the object to be like a boomerang.

content.detailedDescription: My 21 year old niece sent me this picture of a ufo, which she took from the front yard of her house, in la habra heights, ca.  she said that on september 8th, at about 9pm, pst, she saw it traveling east to west and at one point seemed to block out the moon.  if you look at the photo (that she took with her iphone9)you can see it has some markings on the top of it, and the lights are separated.  it looks almost triangular, but rounded at the back where the lights are.  it made no sounds, and although it was a very dark night, there is some detail.
content.summary: It was traveling east to west and seemed to turn slightly as it passed.  at one point it seemed to completely eclipse the moon, and the whole even took about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing football in my yard and looked into the sky. all of a sudden i looked up and a giant triangle shaped object was in the sky. it was moving slowly and lasted for about 15 minutes. once it got to a certain part of the sky it changed direction and after 5 minutes it disappeared. i never saw it again.
content.summary: It was very strange

content.detailedDescription: I was sent a few photos from one of my paranormal investigators while she was walking home. she sent me photo and so i used my computer to do some filtering and seen that it kinda had its own light source..
content.summary: Photo of a orb like object under sun..

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from easter dinner. it was around 9pm approx.It was a very dark part of i-40 near ludlow, ca . i was heading east.I glanced up (i was in the frint passenger seat) and saw what i describe as a neon bright blue, glowing similiarly shaped to a rainbow object. it was curved but not as extreme as what you would think of a rainbow to be.. a bit less curved. it was just hovering over the freeway..Im not sure how far ahead of me it actually was.. but from where i was it looked very large and extrenely bright and it seemed to stretch the entire witdth of the highway .. it mesmerized me..And, then before i could think to much about the detail of it all it just vanished.. it didnt fly away . just vanished. i never saw it move.And then the next morning (today) i was driving my kids to school and i got a phone call from my husband who said he had been watching the az news and there had been a few reports of ufo sightings in phoenix at the same time..Just a small dot of a blue bright lught .. but that was miles and miles away from where i saw mine.. i just found it a strange coincidence..
content.summary: Drivng home from visiting family for easter on the i 40  was passenger in front. it was nightime. straight in front of me down the freeway i saw a lg. rainbow shaped neon blue object hovering over entire road for a few seconds . then just vanished

content.detailedDescription: Walkd ouside of my house looked up in the sky and what looked like a cluster of stars but much brighter then just faded away very fast i spotted them with a green pocket laser in its direction then got a strobe like responce in the front of my house but didn't know where the strobe came from almost like it just came from nowhere. one quick flash that lit up the entire front of the house.
content.summary: 2 strong star like orbs

content.detailedDescription: I am a sky watcher , i was looking at the stars tonight , the sky was finally clear, i noticed a bright light not moving, it caught my eye because i never saw a "star" that big and bright , after looking at it for about a minute, it started to move to my right across the sky not very fast just drifting, it then stopped and drifted to the left, i thought from my view it may be head in my direction appearing to drift left, then it stopped again for a few seconds maybe 10,then started moving right again and definitely away from me as the light was getting smaller, the light did not fade to black it just disappeared. i knew i it wasn't a plane, the light was way to bright, there were no flashing lights, and the way it moved right, then drifted left, then right again, with hovering stops in its movements, am i saying i saw a spaceship? no ,but i definatly saw an unidentified flying object, it was not a satellite, i see them all the time ,they are very small and no where the brightness of this, and it wasn't an airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: I noticed a very bright light in the sky move then drift then move again and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Left my home in santa rosa ca. to drive 45min to work in novato ca. right from the hwy 12 interchange to 101 south i notice black oval object in the sky about 400 ft alt. off to my left. for most of the drive the object paced me. a helicopter joined us somewhere in petaluma. i tried to get video on my camera phone but everytime i went for my phone the object seemed to disappear. i set my phone on the seat next to me in the ready position. at my off ramp, atherton ave. the object moved to the right side of 101. as i was just about over the off-ramp, i managed to get a picture off b4 the craft accelerated straight up. please note that the ufo part is right at the very very beginning of video and you will miss it if you don't catch the first 1 second. i was felt very calm during this entire event. this is not the first time this has happened.
content.summary: It was a black object and difficult to see any details while driving.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: another officer and i were working an off-duty job at a game room in jacksonville.  we were out in the parking lot just talking and, all of a sudden, from the s/w heading to the n/e was this large, translucent blue ���sphere��� which streaked across the sky at incredible speed.  it went from horizon to horizon in about 1 1/2 seconds and there was no sound whatsoever.  the altitude  of this object appeared to be approximately 500 to 1,000 ft.  when it went across, it lit up the parking lot a blue color.  i asked darrel if he saw what i saw and he said ���yes, but i���m not telling anyone���they���ll think we���re both crazy���
content.summary: Translucent sphere, bright blue, traveling extremely fast...No sound.

content.detailedDescription:
incident #3)  i was in johnson county, ga. (near dublin, ga.) this past year on the hunting land our hunt club leases.  i���d gone to my stand in a pine tree well before daybreak and, being very interested in astronomy, i was looking at the stars, which were very visible in the dark sky.  i suddenly saw two, what i thought were satellites moving parallel to each other but, then they stopped suddenly and sat motionless for about 5 seconds.  then they both made 90 degree changes in direction away from each other.  these were so high up, it appeared they were in space.


look, i���m not some nut-job whacko trying to get attention but, i have no doubt these things are real and i feel it���s time our government tells the truth about what is known by so many.



thank you for your time,
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two white lights, appeared to be satellites until they stopped, then changed directions.
